verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> mas-Kil Maschil לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid; of David בִּהְיוֹת֖וֹ <S%H1961><s%> bih-yo-To was in בַמְּעָרָ֣ה <S%H4631><s%> vam-me-'a-Rah when he was in the cave תְפִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-Lah. A Prayer ק֭וֹלִי <S%H6963><s%> Ko-li with my voice אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֶזְעָ֑ק <S%H2199><s%> 'ez-'Ak; I cried ק֝וֹלִ֗י <S%H6963><s%> ko-Li, with my voice אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ <S%H2603><s%> 'et-chan-Nan. did I make my supplication

אֶשְׁפֹּ֣ךְ <S%H8210><s%> 'esh-Poch I poured out לְפָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before שִׂיחִ֑י <S%H7879><s%> si-Chi; my complaint צָ֝רָתִ֗י <S%H6869><s%> tza-ra-Ti, him my trouble לְפָנָ֥יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before אַגִּֽיד׃ <S%H5046><s%> 'ag-Gid. him I shewed

בְּהִתְעַטֵּ֬ף <S%H5848><s%> be-hit-'at-Tef was overwhelmed עָלַ֨י׀ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai within רוּחִ֗י <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chi, When my spirit וְאַתָּה֮ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah You יָדַ֪עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta within me then thou knewest נְֽתִיבָ֫תִ֥י <S%H5410><s%> ne-ti-Va-Ti my path בְּאֹֽרַח־ <S%H734><s%> be-'o-rach- In the way ז֥וּ <S%H2098><s%> zu wherein אֲהַלֵּ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'a-hal-Lech; I walked טָמְנ֖וּ <S%H2934><s%> ta-me-Nu have they privily laid פַ֣ח <S%H6341><s%> fach a snare לִֽי׃ Li.

הַבֵּ֤יט <S%H5027><s%> hab-Beit I looked יָמִ֨ין׀ <S%H3225><s%> ya-Min on [my] right hand וּרְאֵה֮ <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'Eh and beheld וְאֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> ve-'ein- there לִ֪י li מַ֫כִּ֥יר <S%H5234><s%> mak-Kir but [there was] no man that would know אָבַ֣ד <S%H6><s%> 'a-Vad failed מָנ֣וֹס <S%H4498><s%> ma-Nos me refuge מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni; at אֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein is no דּוֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> do-Resh me no man cared לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> le-naf-Shi. for my soul

זָעַ֥קְתִּי <S%H2199><s%> za-'Ak-ti I cried אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, to יְה֫וָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto thee O LORD אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'A-mar-ti I said אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You מַחְסִ֑י <S%H4268><s%> mach-Si; Thou [art] my refuge חֶ֝לְקִ֗י <S%H2506><s%> chel-Ki, [and] my portion בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land הַֽחַיִּים׃ <S%H2416><s%> Ha-chai-yim. of the living

הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה׀ <S%H7181><s%> hak-Shi-vah Attend אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to רִנָּתִי֮ <S%H7440><s%> rin-na-Ti unto my cry כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For דַלּ֪וֹתִ֫י <S%H1809><s%> dal-Lo-Ti low מְאֹ֥ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od very הַצִּילֵ֥נִי <S%H5337><s%> hatz-tzi-Le-ni deliver מֵרֹדְפַ֑י <S%H7291><s%> me-ro-de-Fai; me from my persecutors כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָמְצ֣וּ <S%H553><s%> 'a-me-Tzu for they are stronger מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni. are too

ה֘וֹצִ֤יאָה <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tzi-'ah Bring מִמַּסְגֵּ֨ר׀ <S%H4525><s%> mi-mas-Ger out of prison נַפְשִׁי֮ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul לְהוֹד֪וֹת <S%H3034><s%> le-ho-Dot that I may praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁ֫מֶ֥ךָ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha thy name בִּ֭י bi יַכְתִּ֣רוּ <S%H3803><s%> yach-Ti-ru shall compass me about צַדִּיקִ֑ים <S%H6662><s%> tzad-di-Kim; the righteous כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for תִגְמֹ֣ל <S%H1580><s%> tig-Mol for thou shalt deal bountifully עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. and
